{row[setting[0]]}

 {setting[0]} {picArray[0][row.id] ? : } {console.log('PICS:', picArray)} : <> {/**/}

{row[setting[0]]}

 {setting[0]} {/**/} } )} {Object.keys(row)[1]}: {row[Object.keys(row)[1]]} ) } //"http://192.168.1.38:8100/_capacitor_file_/storage/emulated/0/Android/data/io.ionic.starter/files/data// return ( Br√ºhungen anzeigen {res2} ) }
